cancellation_refund.cancellation_charges: If cancelled before processing, 5% transaction fee applies. Once processed, cancellation may not be possible.
cancellation_refund.refund_policy: Full refund if visa rejected due to our documentation/service (stamped embassy rejection letter required). Partial refund (95%) if cancelled before processing. Refunds within 7 days. Contact help@schengenvisaitinerary.com or WhatsApp +1 718 412 8918.
cancellation_refund.visa_rejection_refund: Yes, full refund if rejection is due to provided documents and verified with embassy letter.

rescheduling_changes.charges: Minor name corrections usually free if not ticketed. Rescheduling may have service charges depending on urgency.

booking_passenger_details.add_passengers: Yes, charges apply: Base Pricing 1 traveller $50, 2 $60, 3 $70, 4+ $80 + $10 per additional. Additional passenger fee $10, children under 12 free. Urgent service fees: Standard $0, 8 hrs +$15, 6 hrs +$30. Extra flights: up to 12 +$20, 16 +$40, 20 +$60. Total = Base Price + Additional + Urgent + Extra flights.
booking_passenger_details.name_corrections: Minor corrections allowed before ticketing. Major changes may require new booking.

visa_specific_concerns.ticket_type: Flight reservation for visa purposes, not ticketed unless requested.
visa_specific_concerns.verify_booking: Yes, reservations verifiable with valid PNR.

pricing_payment.adjustable_cost: No, itinerary and ticket bookings are separate.
pricing_payment.hidden_fees: No hidden charges, all costs transparent.

other_queries.official_confirmation: Yes, confirmation and PNR via email.
other_queries.multiple_visa_usage: Yes, booking valid for multiple visa applications.

ticket_booking.seat_selection: Yes, most airlines allow seat selection; premium seats may cost extra.
ticket_booking.online_checkin: Generally included; check airline website/app 24 hours before departure. Airport check-in also available.
ticket_booking.eticket_pnr: Yes, valid e-ticket and PNR via email after confirmation.
ticket_booking.multi_city_booking: Yes, allowed depending on airline availability.

baggage.free_allowance: Economy 20-30kg checked + 7-10kg cabin; Business 30-40kg checked + 10-15kg cabin.
baggage.extra_charges: Extra baggage $10-$30 per kg over allowance.

cancellation_changes.charges_after_booking: Depends on airline/fare; some tickets non-refundable, refundable tickets may have $20-$100 fee.
cancellation_changes.ticket_type: Depends on fare: non-refundable or refundable with possible credit.
cancellation_changes.date_changes: Allowed with change fee + fare difference. Fees vary by airline/fare type.
cancellation_changes.name_changes: Minor corrections usually allowed; major changes require new booking.

payment_pricing.hidden_fees: No hidden fees; all charges displayed before payment.
payment_pricing.installments: Depends on payment gateway/airline; some support EMI.
payment_pricing.taxes_surcharges: Included in displayed prices unless stated otherwise.

special_requests_services.meal_preference: Yes, can request veg/non-veg or special diet.
special_requests_services.extra_legroom_priority: Extra legroom seats or priority boarding can be added for a fee.
special_requests_services.travel_insurance: Optional, can be added during booking.

other_travel_concerns.documents_checkin: International: Passport + Visa + Airline ticket/PNR. Domestic: Government ID + ticket/PNR.
other_travel_concerns.airport_arrival_time: International: 3 hours prior. Domestic: 2 hours prior.
other_travel_concerns.flight_delay_cancellation: May be eligible for rebooking, refund, or compensation depending on airline rules.
other_travel_concerns.automatic_rebooking: Depends on airline/fare rules; usually provided automatically.
